verses.text: If it had not beenthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*who was on our side, now may Israel say;
If it had not beenthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
Blessed bethe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, who hath not given us asa prey to their teeth.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
Our help isin the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, who made heaven and earth.
